definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: This article shows you how to create a user registration form from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 本文向您展示了创建用户注册表单的全过程。

sentences.english: Select a form or view in the database.
sentences.chinese: 在数据库中选择一个表单或视图。

sentences.english: This step can ensure that the signers of form are trusted.
sentences.chinese: 这一步骤可以确保表单的签名者是可信的。

sentences.english: Enter the data in the form and start the business process by submitting the form.
sentences.chinese: 在表单中输入数据，然后通过提交表单启动业务流程。

sentences.english: Enter the data in the form and start the business process by submitting the form.
sentences.chinese: 在表单中输入数据，然后通过提交表单启动业务流程。

sentences.english: Now the second user can see the first e-form you submitted.
sentences.chinese: 现在第二个用户可以看到您提交的第一个电子表单了。

sentences.english: In addition, it is best to place less-frequently used forms in separate pages.
sentences.chinese: 此外，较少使用的表单最好放置在分开的页面中。

sentences.english: Invokes a command on the local form or in the global environment.
sentences.chinese: 在区域表单上，或在全域环境中，叫用命令。

sentences.english: Enter the folder name to store the new e-form.
sentences.chinese: 输入用于存储新电子表单的文件夹名称。

sentences.english: The form message on FreshBooks is simple and friendly.
The appointment form must have a start date field.
sentences.chinese: 约会表单必须有一个起始日期字段。

sentences.english: Before starting, you need an e-form template.
sentences.chinese: 在开始之前，您需要一个电子表单模板。

sentences.english: The form itself is very simple. It includes the HTML and body start and end tags.
sentences.chinese: 这个表单自身非常简单。

sentences.english: It submits back to itself, so the same controller will be used.
sentences.chinese: 它提交回表单本身，因此会用到同一个控制器。

sentences.english: This action simply draws the field on the form.
sentences.chinese: 这个动作只在表单上绘出此字段。

sentences.english: The user is presented with a form and inputs a fully qualified classname.
sentences.chinese: 它为用户提供一个表单，让其输入完全限定的类名称。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
